content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.law.columbia.edu/", "question": "What resources are available for legal research?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a webpage for Columbia Law School, which provides information on admissions, academics, areas of study, faculty and scholarship, careers, community life, and news and events. It does not directly provide information on resources available for legal research.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to main site navigation (https://www.law.columbia.edu/#main-menu)', 'Skip to main content (https://www.law.columbia.edu/#main-content)', '\\n\\n (https://www.law.columbia.edu/)', 'Incoming J.D. Students (https://www.law.columbia.edu/incoming-jd-students)', 'Current Students (https://www.law.columbia.edu/current-students)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "legal research resources"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://guides.library.harvard.edu/law/free", "https://guides.sll.texas.gov/legal-research-for-beginners", "https://www.law.gmu.edu/library/freelegalresearch", "https://pro.bloomberglaw.com/the-complete-legal-research-resource/", "https://www.clio.com/blog/best-free-legal-research-tools/", "https://courts.alaska.gov/library/aklegal.htm", "https://research.un.org/en/legal", "https://www.lexisnexis.com/community/insights/legal/b/thought-leadership/posts/best-free-legal-research-tools"]', type='action_result')]
"""
